data.name: ItemOnUse_NewQuest
data.value: On Use: New quest!

data.name: ItemOnUse_NewQuest_Letter_BreakSealAndRead
data.value: On Use: Break the seal and read the letter.

data.name: KeyBlock_NotUnlocked_Home_Fireplace
data.value: As you inspect your fireplace you notice a strange indentation in the form of a locket that encloses three triangles. Where does it come from? You don't have anything that fits...

data.name: KeyBlock_NotUnlocked_MissingKey_Special
data.value: Blocked... hmpf. It seems like you need a special key to unlock it.

data.name: KeyBlock_NotUnlocked_NoKey_ShimmeringCrystal
data.value: There seems to be an indentation in the stone. What could fit into it..?

data.name: KeyBlock_NotUnlocked_NoKey_SmallUniversalWind
data.value: The key block speaks with a dark voice: "GIVE ME A SMALL WINDY KEY, AND YOU SHALL BE ALLOWED TO PASS BY."

data.name: MN_Tingle
data.value: Merchant Tingle

data.name: MN_TravelingSalesman
data.value: Traveling Salesman

data.name: NewQuest_CantEverAccept
data.value: You get this feeling that you already know all that is there know about this. Meh...

data.name: RouteOfDin_WindSwordBlock_NotUnlocked
data.value: The inscription on the block says: 'Only a true Hero may open this lock.' As you try to push it you see that the key-hole is S-shaped.

data.name: SignPost_Empty
data.value: ... You stare at the sign post and see absolutely nothing interesting. ... ... ... ... ...

data.name: SignPost_TiaWoodsDirections
data.value: > > Hyrule Rivers ^ > Minor Shrine ^ < Route of Din

data.name: TalkFriendly_TownFolk_Milly_1
data.value: You've been nice. But my brother is still cuter!

data.name: TalkFriendly_TownFolk_Milly_2
data.value: La la la la la la la la la la la la la la la la la la la la la la la la la la la la la la la la la la ... Do you like me singing?

data.name: TalkFriendly_TownFolk_Milly_3
data.value: Aren't I the most absolutely fabulous person you have ever seen? -blinks at you-

data.name: TalkHonored_GhostBuster_1
data.value: I'm the best ghost hunter of not just Hyrule Rivers and all Hyrule, BUT also the complete world !!! And no, none will ever surpass me.

data.name: TalkHonored_GhostBuster_2
data.value: Ghosts here? Call me and I'll send you to do the work. Hehehe ...

data.name: TalkHonored_GhostBuster_3
data.value: When I hunt ghost I do it in a slick way. See? Ssssslick. Sssssliiickkk. Study my ways and you may be like me one day ~!!

data.name: TalkHonored_TownFolk_Milly_1
data.value: I must really say that ... ... you're just as ... erm ... cute as my brother! -blinks-

data.name: TalkHonored_TownFolk_Milly_2
data.value: Some day people will sing their own songs just about you!

data.name: TalkHonored_TownFolk_Milly_3
data.value: Hey! How was your day? Do you want to play together with me?

data.name: TalkNeutral_GhostBuster_1
data.value: I'm the best ghost hunter of not just Hyrule Rivers and all Hyrule, BUT also the complete world !!!

data.name: TalkNeutral_GhostBuster_2
data.value: Ghosts here? Call me and I'll fix the problem. Hehehe ...

data.name: TalkNeutral_GhostBuster_3
data.value: When I hunt ghost I do it in a slick way. See? Ssssslick. Sssssliickkk.

data.name: TalkNeutral_Goron_Mindo_1
data.value: Did you know that the mad Gorons also somtimes carry Black Goron Keys? I wonder why.. Where are all these blocks that would fit those keys?

data.name: TalkNeutral_Goron_Mindo_2
data.value: It's terrible! Some of the Gorons have gone mad! What do we do?

data.name: TalkNeutral_Maja_1
data.value: Seiri - Throw away all rubbish and unrelated materials in the workplace.

data.name: TalkNeutral_Maja_2
data.value: Seiton - Set everything in proper place for quick retrieval and storage.

data.name: TalkNeutral_Maja_3
data.value: Seiso - Clean the workplace; everyone should be a janitor.

data.name: TalkNeutral_Maja_4
data.value: Seiketsu - Standardize the way of maintaining cleanliness.

data.name: TalkNeutral_Maja_5
data.value: Shitsuke - Practice the 5S daily, make it a way of life; this also means 'commitment'.

data.name: TalkNeutral_Maja_6
data.value: Seiri, Seiton, Seiso, Seiketsu and Shitsuke. These are my ways.

data.name: TalkNeutral_TownFolk_BoyBilly_1
data.value: I'm Billy the Hilly, oh soooo ... erm ... Who are you again?

data.name: TalkNeutral_TownFolk_BoyBilly_2
data.value: Billy is my name. Honor me and I shall allow you to be in my sight!

data.name: TalkNeutral_TownFolk_Milly_1
data.value: My brother is soooo cute compared to you.

data.name: TalkNeutral_TownFolk_Milly_2
data.value: La la la la la la la la la la la la la la la la la la la la la la la la la la la la la la la la la la ... WHY ARE YOU STILL HERE?

data.name: TalkNeutral_TownFolk_Milly_3
data.value: Aren't I the most absolutely fabulous person you have ever seen?

data.name: TalkNeutral_TownFolk_OldMan_1
data.value: Isn't the weather just perfect lately?

data.name: TalkNeutral_TownFolk_OldWoman_1
data.value: Oh oh oh! Have you seen my children lately?

data.name: TalkNeutral_TownFolk_OldWoman_2
data.value: The sun has gone from the shining skies, Bye, baby, bye, The dandelions have closed their eyes, Bye, baby, bye. The stars are lighting their lamps to see. If babes and squirrels and birds and bees, Are sound asleep as they should be, Bye, baby, bye.

data.name: TalkNeutral_TownFolk_OldWoman_3
data.value: The squirrel keeps warm in his furs of gray, Bye, baby, bye, 'Neath feathers, birdies are tucked away, Bye, baby, bye. In yellow jackets, the bees sleep tight. And cuddle close through the chilly night, My baby's snug in her gown of white, Bye, baby, bye.

data.name: TalkNeutral_TownFolk_OldWoman_4
data.value: Do you know how to make Red Dye? It's quite simple with a little magic! All you'll need is a Small Empty Bottle, two piles of Skeleton Bone Powder and five Red Potions! Trust me boy, trust me. Hehehe.

data.name: TalkNeutral_TownFolk_TiaWoodsTingle_1
data.value: Nothing in stock for you? Just come back later!

data.name: TalkNeutral_TownFolk_TombKid_Older_1
data.value: It's all my younger brother's fault. Tell him that!

data.name: TalkNeutral_TownFolk_TombKid_Older_2
data.value: I can't remember how we got here.

data.name: TalkNeutral_TownFolk_TombKid_Older_3
data.value: Standing outside here all day and night is getting old and boring.

data.name: TalkNeutral_TownFolk_TombKid_Younger_1
data.value: It's all my older brother's fault. Tell him that!

data.name: TalkNeutral_TownFolk_TombKid_Younger_2
data.value: Where's my mother? Aaaaaaa. Aaaaaaaaaaa. Aaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa.

data.name: TalkNeutral_TownFolk_TombKid_Younger_3
data.value: I'm sooo hungry. I want fish!

data.name: Talk_Crow_Start
data.value: Awk. Kra. Kraaa. Kraaaaaaa. Kraakra. [Let me. I want to watch the floating bones.] Kraaaa. Krah! [Go away!] Kra.. krah.. Kraka.. Kraa? Kra. [Hmm.. does it understand what I say? No.. never. Krah.]
